title: How to Catch Rayquaza in Pokémon SoulSilver Without Hacks

steps.title: Go to Mr.
steps.content: Go to Mr. Pokémon's house after getting the National Pokédex. He will give you an orb.

steps.title: Take it to the cave that leads to the Safari Zone.
steps.content: Take it to the cave that leads to the Safari Zone.

steps.title: Go down the ladders that took you to the Safari Zone.
steps.content: Go down the ladders that took you to the Safari Zone.

steps.title: Surf out a bit and you will find a cave; head into the cave.
steps.content: Surf out a bit and you will find a cave; head into the cave. Groudon will be waiting for you. It will be at level 50.

steps.title: Once you catch Groudon, make sure you have a friend who has HeartGold who will lend you a Kyogre for a while.
steps.content: Once you catch Groudon, make sure you have a friend who has HeartGold who will lend you a Kyogre for a while.

steps.title: Head back to the same cave and Rayquaza will be there.
steps.content: Head back to the same cave and Rayquaza will be there. It will also be level 50. Catch it and it's yours!
